Tasks.Task Description: Use Azure Monitor to track key metrics such as throughput, latency, and errors for Event Hubs. Ensure the analytics pipeline is functioning as expected.
Review the performance of consumer groups to ensure they are processing events efficiently. Identify bottlenecks or lagging consumers.
Ensure that data retention policies are configured correctly to meet analytics requirements. Adjust retention settings as needed.
Review security settings, including access controls and encryption, to ensure compliance with organizational policies and analytics data protection requirements.
Analyze partitioning strategy to ensure optimal distribution of events for analytics workloads. Adjust partition keys if necessary.
Conduct failover tests to ensure high availability and resiliency of Event Hubs in analytics pipelines. Verify that backup systems are operational.
Evaluate scaling configurations to ensure Event Hubs can handle peak analytics workloads. Adjust throughput units or auto-scaling settings as needed.
Update documentation related to Event Hubs analytics pipelines, including configurations, data flow diagrams, and troubleshooting guides.
Perform regular health checks on analytics pipelines using Event Hubs to ensure data is being ingested and processed correctly.
Ensure that data encryption is enabled for Event Hubs and that encryption keys are rotated periodically to secure analytics data.

Tasks.Task: Review Event Hub Logs for Anomalies
Tasks.Task Description: Analyze logs generated by Event Hubs to identify anomalies or unusual patterns that could impact analytics operations.
Develop plans for upgrading Event Hub capacity to accommodate growing analytics workloads. Coordinate with stakeholders to minimize disruptions.

Tasks.Task: Engage in Training for Analytics Team
Tasks.Task Description: Provide training to analytics teams on Event Hubs features, best practices, and troubleshooting techniques to enhance operational efficiency.
Regularly back up Event Hub configurations to ensure quick recovery in case of accidental changes or failures.

Tasks.Task: Gather User Feedback on Analytics Performance
Tasks.Task Description: Collect feedback from analytics users to identify areas for improvement in Event Hub performance and reliability.
